meanings.definition: A mythical creature in folklore, typically depicted as a small, mischievous being with pointed ears and magical powers.
meanings.sent1: The elves in the story helped the main character on their quest.
meanings.sent2: I read a book about elves and their magical adventures.
meanings.sent3: The elves played a prank on the villagers by hiding their shoes.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements on stage made her seem like an elf among humans.
meanings.sent5: The forest was alive with the whispers of the elves, guiding travelers on their journey.

meanings.sent1: There were many elves living in the enchanted forest.
meanings.sent2: The elves gathered together to celebrate the winter solstice.
meanings.sent3: The elves' tiny footprints in the snow looked like a trail of breadcrumbs.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with laughter as the elves shared stories of their adventures.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with colorful flowers tended to by the diligent elves.
